p: Deadly pathogens and parasites may be transmitted by arthropods [ 4], and the increasing global human and animal populations are threatened by such epidemics and pandemics [ 5]. Mosquitoes (Diptera: Culicidae) represent the most threatening vector due to their role in the transmission of dangerous pathogens [ 1]. Through trade and travel, key mosquito species are being introduced into novel habitats [ 2, 6, 7].
